name: Super Addons for Elementor
author: Themehat

sections.description:
Enhance your Elementor page building experience with 15+ creative elements and extensions. Add powers to your page builder using our easy-to-use elements those were designed to make your next WordPress page and posts design easier and prettier than ever before.

Check the Demos

Completely Customizable

Each element comes with bunch of options to control every possible things. You can achieve nearly any design with your imagination.

Light Weight & Instant Loading

No extra resources or messy codes to slow down your website. Optimized for super fast loading and instant Live editing.

Elements Control option

Enable and disable individual elements to make your page loading faster and smoother. You can deactivate unnecessary widgets to keep the site lite.

Expert Support

We have extra-ordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, or contact us directly through live chat and contact form.

Elementor page builder is required for this plugin.

8+ FREE WIDGETS AND COUNTING

We have designed 8 of the most useful widgets to enhance your Elementor Page Building experience and allow you to climb the top of your design capabilities.

  1. Post Grid – Showcase your blog posts in 3 unique styles
  2. Creative Buttons – Create stunning Button For Your Website.
  3. Slider – Design your page using The Slider
  4. Team Member – Quickly add modern Team Member with hover effect in your post or page
  5. Section Title – Add A very Comfortable Title In Your Website. There’s No One Who Will Provide This One Free. Its Really Awesome. You can apply different gradient styles, angles, opacity, and positions to make them look even better across different device screens.
  6. Logo Carousel – Add Company Logo Carousel Demo
  7. Icon Box – Set Your Icon Box
  8. Call To Action – Add A Action Section For Make User A Click
sections.installation:
Step 1: Upload the plugin file to install by navigating through Plugins➔Add New➔Upload Plugin➔Choose File to Install from your WordPress dashboard or you can simply search for the Super Addons For Elementor from the plugin directory by going to Plugins➔Add New and search for the plugin in the search tab to install it on your WordPress site.

Step 2: After successful installation, you have to click the “activate” button to activate the Super Addons For Elementor.

Step 3: When you activate Super Addons For Elementor you will Get The Widget In The Elementor Editor.
sections.faq:
Can I use Super Addons For Elementor without Elementor?

You cannot use Super Addons For Elementor without Elementor. Super Addons For Elementor is a collection of slick, powerful widgets that works seamlessly with Elementor page builder and it’s only for Elementor.

Does it work along with other Elementor Addons?

Yes, it does.

Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it works with any WordPress theme that works with Elementor. And it best works with Hello Elementor.

Does it work with Elementor Pro?

Yes, undoubtedly.

Will Super Addons For Elementor break my site after an update?

No, It won’t break your site or any page where you used Super Addons For Elementor. We put our best effort to make you happy.

short_description: The Super Addons plugin you install after Elementor! 15+ Premium elements, including Post Grid,Team Member, Section Title, Icon Box Etc.
